Interface Unwrapping.Skip

All Superinterfaces:
Payload
Enclosing interface:
Unwrapping
public static interface Unwrapping.Skip extends Payload
Skip the unwrapping if it has been enabled on the ValueExtractor by the UnwrapByDefault annotation.
Since:
2.0
Author:
Guillaume Smet
